                                                </div>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div
                                        class="col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center">
                                        <div class="sh_odoo_custom_tab_content pe-lg-0"
                                            data-aos="fade-left">
                                            <h2 class="sh_heading_title">Celebrating Together: A
                                                Memorable Bhajiya Party at Softhealer Technologies</h2>
                                            <p class="sh_text">
                                                At Softhealer Technologies, we believe in the power
                                                of community, collaboration, and, of course, good
                                                food! Last week, we had the pleasure of organizing a
                                                Bhajiya Party that turned out to be one of the most
                                                memorable and fun-filled events we've had in a
                                                while.
                                            </p>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </section>
                <!--sh_bhajiya_sbout_section end-->
                <!--sh_bhajiya_party_idea_section-->
                <section id="sh_bhajiya_party_idea_section" class="sh_bhajiya_party_idea_section">
                    <div class="container">
                        <div class="row">
                            <div class="sh_inner_box">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div
                                        class="col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center">
                                        <div class="sh_odoo_custom_tab_content pe-lg-0"
                                            data-aos="fade-left">
                                            <h2 class="sh_heading_title">The Idea Behind the Bhajiya
                                                Party</h2>
                                            <p class="sh_text">
                                                In the fast-paced world of technology, where
                                                deadlines, projects, and innovation often take
                                                center stage, it's important to take a step back and
                                                enjoy the simple pleasures of life. With the monsoon
                                                season in full swing, what could be better than a
                                                warm, crispy plate of bhajiyas shared with friends
                                                and colleagues? The idea of the Bhajiya Party was
                                                born out of this thoughtâ€”bringing everyone together
                                                to relax, enjoy, and connect over delicious food.
                                            </p>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div
                                        class="col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12"
                                        data-aos="fade-right">
                                        <div class="sh_odoo_custom_tab_box">
                                            <div class="sh_photo_group">
                                                <div class="sh_second_photo">

                </section>
                <!--sh_bhajiya_party_idea_section end-->
                <!--sh_bhajiya_setting_scene_section-->
                <section id="sh_bhajiya_setting_scene_section" class="sh_bhajiya_setting_scene_section">
                    <div class="container">
                        <div class="row">
                            <div class="sh_inner_box">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div
                                        class="col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12"
                                        data-aos="fade-right">
                                        <div class="sh_odoo_custom_tab_box">

                                                    </svg>
                                                </div>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div
                                        class="col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center">
                                        <div class="sh_odoo_custom_tab_content pe-lg-0"
                                            data-aos="fade-left">
                                            <h2 class="sh_heading_title">Setting the Scene</h2>
                                            <p class="sh_text">
                                                The event was held in our office cafeteria, which
                                                was transformed into a lively, festive space. The
                                                aroma of freshly fried bhajiyas filled the air,
                                                instantly putting everyone in a cheerful mood. The
                                                decorations were simple yet vibrant, with colorful
                                                banners and strings of lights adding to the
                                                ambiance.
                                            </p>
                                            <p class="sh_text">
                                                A variety of bhajiyas were on the menu, including
                                                the classic potato bhajiyas, onion bhajiyas, and the
                                                crowd-favorite chili bhajiyas. We also had an array
                                                of chutneys to complement the snacks, ranging from
                                                tangy tamarind to spicy green chutney.
                                            </p>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </section>
                <!-- sh_bhajiya_setting_scene_section end -->
                 <!-- bringing team together start -->
                <section id="sh_bhajiya_bringing_section" class="sh_bhajiya_bringing_section">
                    <div class="container">
                        <div class="row">
                            <div class="sh_inner_box">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div
                                        class="col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center">
                                        <div class="sh_odoo_custom_tab_content pe-lg-0"
                                            data-aos="fade-left">
                                            <h2 class="sh_heading_title"> Bringing the Team Together</h2>
                                            <p class="sh_text">
                                                The Bhajiya Party was more than just about food; it
                                                was an opportunity for everyone to unwind and
                                                connect outside the usual work setting. The event
                                                was a perfect mix of fun activities, laughter, and
                                                team bonding. We organized a few games and
                                                activities to keep the energy high, including a
                                                bhajiya-eating contest that had everyone cheering
                                                and laughing.

                                            </p>
                                            <p class="sh_text">
                                                One of the highlights of the event was the live
                                                cooking station where our very own team members
                                                tried their hand at frying bhajiyas. It was
                                                heartening to see everyone come together, from
                                                seasoned cooks to those trying it for the first
                                                time. The camaraderie and teamwork displayed were
                                                truly reflective of the spirit of Softhealer
                                                Technologies.
                                            </p>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div
                                        class="col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12"
                                        data-aos="fade-right">
                                        <div class="sh_odoo_custom_tab_box">
                                            <div class="sh_photo_group">
                                                <div class="sh_second_photo">
                                                    <img
                                                        src="/theme_softhealer_website/static/src/img/blogs_bkp/bhajiya_party/4.webp"

                </section>
                <!--sh_bhajiya_bringing_section end-->
                <section id="sh_bhajiya_party_take_away_section" class="sh_bhajiya_party_take_away_section">
                    <div class="container">
                        <div class="row">
                            <div class="sh_inner_box">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div
                                        class="col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12"
                                        data-aos="fade-right">
                                        <div class="sh_odoo_custom_tab_box">
                                            <div class="sh_photo_group">

                                                    </svg>
                                                </div>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div
                                        class="col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center">
                                        <div class="sh_odoo_custom_tab_content pe-lg-0"
                                            data-aos="fade-left">
                                            <h2 class="sh_heading_title">The Takeaway</h2>
                                            <p class="sh_text">
                                                The Bhajiya Party was a resounding success,
                                                reminding us all of the importance of taking a break
                                                and enjoying the little things in life. It was a day
                                                filled with joy, laughter, and delicious food, and
                                                it left everyone with warm memories to cherish.
                                            </p>
                                            <p class="sh_text">
                                                At Softhealer Technologies, we strive to create an
                                                environment where our team feels valued and
                                                connected, not just as colleagues but as a
                                                close-knit community. Events like the Bhajiya Party
                                                are a testament to our commitment to fostering a
                                                positive and collaborative workplace culture.
                                            </p>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </section>
                <!-- sh_bhajiya_party_take_away_section end -->
